titleStmt.title: Letter from Donald C. Dickinson to John G. Neihardt
titleStmt.author: Dickinson, Donald C.

publicationStmt.authority: The Papers of John G. Neihardt

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Letter from Donald C. Dickinson to John G. Neihardt

msIdentifier.repository: John G. Neihardt Center Research Library, Aly Collection

body.div1:
1 1
5835 Vine Street Lincoln, Nebraska
March 22, 1968
Mr. John G. Neihardt Dear Mr. Neihardt:
Page 13 FRIENDS OF THE LIBRARY UNIVERSITY OF MISSOURI COLUMBIA, MISSOUIR 65201
Please return this to me at Route 7, Columbia, J.N.
I have a copy of a letter written by Dr. Parker on March 12 mentioning the ceremony we have planned on April 20 in connection with the Friends of the Library. Now, further to Dr. Parker's letter we would like to honor you at the same time with a dedication ceremony of the Neihardt Colleciton and the bust, which we have just mounted. We would like to hold this ceremony in the library following our annual Friends meeting in the afternoon of Saturday, April 20. At this same time we will also be pre-sention Mr. Knipmeyer with an honorarium for his work on the
collection.
Since we wish to get started with publicity, I would like to know if you would be able to be here with us in Columbia on the date mentioned? Perhaps when you receive this letter you would be kind enought to call me collect here in the library and let me know your thoughts on this matter. Very best wishes to you. I will be looking forward to hearing from you.
Sincerely, Donald C. Dickinson Donald C. Dickinson Secretary Friends of the Library
body.note:
Dear Knipmeyer,
I phoned, as requested, and will be there on April 20th.
I am surprised you have not heard. Love - John N.

note.italics: Serving the Libraries of the University of Missouri on Four Campuses
